long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We plan to tranform recruiting industry with an aim to help recruiters scout for candidate profiles from different sourcing platforms.. 
This extension will help us do that... 
Recruiters today have to do a lot of manual work to find the right candidates for a given job. With the help of this tool we intend to automate a lot of this manual task,
